channel.title: Best Of Tech & Startup:. ~2x curated episodes per week
channel.description: Curating & reposting the ~2 best podcasts per week from the likes of a16z, recode, Tim Ferriss, TED, etc. There are simply too many good podcasts out there, let us pick the best two each week for you. Copyright is owned by the publisher, not this podcast, audio is streamed directly from publisher's servers.

item.title: Stuff You Should Know: The Delightful History of Steam Technology
item.description: Things are bleak in Brazil. Prices are high, governments are broke, and gangs are tightening their control over the country’s slums.
item.itunes:author: Slate Magazine

item.title: Scientific American - 60-Second Science: Model Black Hole Re-Creates Stephen Hawking Prediction
item.description: A black hole analogue, which traps sound instead of light, generates "Hawking radiation," a key prediction by the theoretical physicist. Christopher Intagliata reports.
item.itunes:author: Christopher Intagliata
item.itunes:subtitle: A black hole analogue, which traps sound instead of light, generates "Hawking radiation," a key prediction by the theoretical physicist. Christopher Intagliata reports.
